Mechanical Engineering

Handbuilt Fixed-Gear Bicycle

When I couldn't find the bike I wanted, I decided I'd build one myself. I designed and welded this steel frame and outfitted it with components.

Sprinter Camper Van

I lived in this van for 6 months while traveling the American West. The van featured solar power, stove, sink, bed, and custom cabinetry.

Software Development

Integrated Trip Booking Software

This sytem uses Zapier, Google Apps Script, & Airtable relational databases to generate internal and client-facing documents for a climbing guide service, halving per-trip administrative time.

Custom Template Website with Jekyll & Sass

I built this website using Jekyll. Project previews, project pages, and the project directory are automatically generated. All HTML & CSS were written with Sass and the Learn Enough tutorial.
